titles.title: Tax Incentives to Encourage Recycling Act of 2004
TIER Act of 2004

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives to encourage manufacturers of computer and television equipment to operate an environmentally sound recycling program for use by consumers who want to discard the equipment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/14/2004--Introduced. Tax Incentives to Encourage Recycling Act of 2004 (TIER Act of 2004) - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow manufacturers of computer and television equipment a business tax credit for the disposal and recyling of such equipment.
